query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_agent_communications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversation_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  sender_agent_id INT NOT NULL,
  receiver_agent_id INT,
  message_type ENUM('request', 'response', 'broadcast', 'internal_thought', 'decision') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  context JSON,
  reasoning TEXT,
  confidence INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX conversation_idx (conversation_id),
  INDEX sender_idx (sender_agent_id),
  INDEX receiver_idx (receiver_agent_id)
)

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversation_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  sender_agent_id INT NOT NULL,
  receiver_agent_id INT,
  message_type ENUM('request', 'response', 'broadcast', 'internal_thought', 'decision') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  context JSON,
  reasoning TEXT,
  confidence INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX conversation_idx (conversation_id),
  INDEX sender_idx (sender_agent_id),
  INDEX receiver_idx (receiver_agent_id)
)
